name: Jake's Field of Dreams
description:
Jake's Field of Dreams Baseball honors the life of Jake Vollmer, who was diagnosed with Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy, and passed away in 2012. He persevered in becoming the greatest sports fan he could, cheering for all who played the games he could not. He wanted all kids to be able to experience and have the thrill of being a player. This game is dedicated to him.

To play Jake's Field of Dreams Baseball, two kids complete head to head, each picking a pitch or a swing. Whoever can complete their play first by using the designated pieces of equipment either scores a hit or a run! Compete to see who is king or queen of the ballpark!


HELPING BALANCE SCREEN TIME
We know that balancing screen-time can be tough! That's why Biba games like Jake's Field of Dreams seek to use screens to get parents and kids engaging in outdoor and active experiences on their local playground. No sitting around staring at screens, in Biba games, kids ARE the avatars!

EASY TO PLAY
Biba games are simple to play and designed to re-imagine play for children, breaking kids away from sedentary video game experiences and getting them outside where the real fun happens.

DRIVING KID’S IMAGINATIONS
A whole new category of imagination-driven games that bring back the basic joy of play, blending digital interaction with the real world physical activity that kids need!

TOTALLY FREE & PRIVATE
We here at Biba are parents too, which means all of our games are not only free forever, but they respect your privacy, complying with COPPA/PIPEDA privacy legislation at every turn.

ACTIVE AND OUTDOOR
Biba games are intended specifically to get kids participating in what the World Health Organization refers to as “moderate-to-vigorous physical activity”--games that elevate heart rate and encourage consistent movement.


And don’t forget - Biba games are often wacky and unconventional, so for the best experience, please remember to agree to camera and microphone permissions when asked for!

Visit www.playbiba.com for more!
